# VideoPlayerComponent.ImmersiveViewingMode.full

**Case**

A viewing mode that renders immersive video covering the viewer’s entire field of view.

## Declaration

```swift
case full
```
title: VideoPlayerComponent.ImmersiveViewingMode.full
